title: SQL Server
description: elastic.io integration component for Microsoft SQL Server

server.label: Server (you can use 'host\\instance' to connect to named instance)

port.label: Port (don't set when connecting to named instance)

encrypt.label: Encrypt (check this option if you're using Windows Azure)

domain.label: Domain (driver will connect to SQL Server using domain login)

insert.title: INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE
insert.description: Executes a single SQL statement that causes database data update and returns a number of affected records, like INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE

query.label: SQL Query
query.note: You can use parameters of message body as @value:number and type is :type

selectAction.title: SELECT
selectAction.description: Executes a SELECT statement that fetches potentially multiple database rows from the database

selectTrigger.title: SELECT
selectTrigger.description: Executes a SELECT statement that fetches potentially multiple database rows from the database

query.label: SQL Query
